# Mattermost

![Mattermost Logo](/img/mattermost.png)

Mattermost is an open-source, self-hostable online chat service with file sharing, search, and integrations. It is designed as an internal chat for organisations and companies, and mostly markets itself as an open-source alternative to Slack and Microsoft Teams.

If you have questions or want to connect with other BCCH MRI Research Facility users, you can download Mattermost and connect with us.

## Install

### Computer

For your computer, you will want to install Mattermost Desktop. [Click here](https://mattermost.com/download/#desktop) to choose your operating system and use their install guide.

### Mobile

Mattermost can also be installed on your phone. [Click here](https://mattermost.com/download/#mobile) to choose your phone operating system.

## Setup

[*NOTE: You will need a BCCHR username to gain access.*]

1. You will need to ask to be invited. [Click here](https://link)
2. After you are given access: open mattermost (either Desktop or Mobile)
3. For server display name, use: ``
4. For server URL, use: `https://im.bcchr.ca/`
5. Login with your BCCHR username and password

### Add A Photo of Yourself

It can be very helpful to others to include a photo or yourself.

1. Go to `Account Settings` (Top right on Desktop app, and bottom right on Mobile app)
2. Click on `Your Profile`
3. Edit your Profile Picture
